name: Tub Tub Simulator
description:
BREAKING NEWS A RANDOM KID IS GOING ON A STROLL!
Random kid tamed tub tub is going around town doing parkour, eating burgers, going threw the never ending highway! The list is endless! With this game you can play as tub tub and do everything listed above! AND if you dare....  go to different town!CONTROLS:Move: WASDMove faster: [Shift] + WASDMove up: [Space]
